title: In France, an Outburst Is a Setback for the Far Right
description: For the first time, the National Rally is the main opposition party in Parliament. But can it use its new perch to convince voters it has changed?
dc:creator: Catherine Porter and Constant Méheut
category: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
media:description: Carlos Martens Bilongo, center right, and Mathilde Panot, both members of Parliament, at a rally outside the National Assembly in Paris on Friday. Their colleague was punished for shouting “Back to Africa!” while Mr. Bilongo was speaking.
